name: 'Buzz Lightyear: The Adventure Begins' Trivia Game | Movies | 20 Questions

questions.text: At the beginning of the movie, Buzz and his partner are looking for 3 lost LGMs. What does LGM stand for?
questions.correct: little green men & little green man
questions.explanation: little green men & little green man.

questions.text: What was his partner's name?
questions.explanation:
Warp Darkmatter.

	Voiced by Diedrich Bader.

questions.text: What monster do they fight while looking for the LGMs?
questions.explanation: crater viper slag monster mutant.

questions.text: How was Zurg going to pick his captive LGMs' minds?
questions.explanation: cranial disect-a-bot.

questions.text: What is Zurg's latest henchman called?
questions.explanation:
Agent Z.

	It was the name Zurg's mother called him.

questions.text: A robotic ranger was created to be Buzz's new partner. What was he called?
questions.explanation:
XR.

	For eXperimental Ranger. (Voiced by Larry Miller)

questions.text: Who was the janitor of Star Command HQ?
questions.explanation:
Booster.

	Voiced by Stephen Furst.

questions.text: Who was Buzz's new rookie partner assigned by Commander Nebula?
questions.explanation:
Mira Nova.

	Princess of Tangea. (Voiced by Nicole Sullivan.)

questions.text: How many times was XR torn to pieces?
questions.explanation:
2.

	Once by the LGMs as a demo, once by Agent Z during the battle on the LGM homeworld.

questions.text: What peace negotiation with Zurg does XR suggest after the LGM's fix him?
options: have a Coke and a smile
questions.explanation:
time-share the galaxy.

	Zurg gets the galaxy Monday, Tuesday, {Wednesday;} Star Command Thursday, Friday, {Saturday;} they alternate Sundays.

questions.text: What is the number on Buzz Lightyear's star cruiser?
questions.explanation:
42.

	Perhaps in reference to Hitchhikers' Guide to the Galaxy.

questions.text: Zurg steals the LGMs' Unimind from their homeworld. What color does it turn when he turns it evil?
questions.explanation:
purple.

	It was green and yellow with a Saturn-like ring when it was good.

questions.text: How did Buzz's rookie partner knock him out to steal the Alpha One experimental spaceship?
questions.explanation: Tangean brain squeeze.

questions.text: Who 'accidentally' stowed away when Buzz when after his partner?
questions.explanation:
XR Booster & Booster XR.

	Booster was pretending to be Buzz when Buzz came aboard. He and XR didn't have time to leave, so they hid.

questions.text: What planet did Zurg first use the evil Unimind on?
questions.explanation: Rizone, the vegetarian planet.

questions.text: How did Zurg describe his nana (grandmother)?
questions.explanation: plenty evil.

questions.text: How did Buzz land the Alpha One on Zurg's planet?
questions.explanation:
Pontoons.

	Booster accidentally activated the water-landing sequence. Pontoons expanded, and the Alpha One bounced to a landing.

questions.text: What color was Buzz's new rookie partner's hair?
questions.explanation:
red.

	Long red hair.

questions.text: Who did Zurg's new agent turn out to be?
questions.explanation:
Warp Darkmatter & Warp & Darkmatter.

	His first partner was a traitor, ever since Academy days.

questions.text: Instead of a single partner, Buzz decides to captain a space ranger team. Who was not part of Buzz's new team at the end of the movie?
questions.explanation: LGM 1.
